Uses of Package
org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header

  • Packages that use org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.sam
    Internal package for working with SAM data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.sam.index
    Internal package for working with Bam indexes.
    org.jcvi.jillion.sam
    This package contains classes for working with Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) and Binary Alignment/Map (BAM) formatted data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.sam.attribute
    This package deals with Sam Attributes for an individual "Sam Segment" record.
    org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header
    This package contains classes for working with Sam and Bam header information.
    org.jcvi.jillion.sam.index
    This package contains classes for working with BAM indexes.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header used by org.jcvi.jillion.internal.sam 
    Class and Description
    SamHeader
    SamHeader is an object representation of the header of a SAM or BAM file.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header used by org.jcvi.jillion.internal.sam.index 
    Class and Description
    SamHeader
    SamHeader is an object representation of the header of a SAM or BAM file.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header used by org.jcvi.jillion.sam 
    Class and Description
    SamHeader
    SamHeader is an object representation of the header of a SAM or BAM file.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header used by org.jcvi.jillion.sam.attribute 
    Class and Description
    SamHeader
    SamHeader is an object representation of the header of a SAM or BAM file.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header used by org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header 
    Class and Description
    SamHeader
    SamHeader is an object representation of the header of a SAM or BAM file.
    SamHeaderBuilder
    Builder is the builder class used to construct a SamHeader
    SamHeaderTagKey
    SamHeaderTagKey is an object representation of the two letter key of a Header Tag.
    SamProgram
    SamProgram contains information about a specific program and its invocation used in the pipeline that generated this SAM File.
    SamProgramBuilder
    Builder is the Builder object used to create SamProgram instances.
    SamReadGroup
    SamReadGroup is a way to group reads as belonging to a particular set.
    SamReadGroup.PlatformTechnology 
    SamReadGroupBuilder
    Builder class to construct a ReadGroup using a fluent interface.
    SamReferenceSequence
    SamReferenceSequence is an object representation of the metadata for a reference used in a SAM or BAM file.
    SamReferenceSequenceBuilder 
    SamVersion
    SamVersion is an object representation of how which version of the SAM format the SAM file is encoded in.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header used by org.jcvi.jillion.sam.index 
    Class and Description
    SamHeader
    SamHeader is an object representation of the header of a SAM or BAM file.
